body:
$! Tell HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC) if your tax code is wrong. You'll need to give them your National Insurance number and your PAYE reference - you can find these on your payslip. $!

$C 

**HMRC Income Tax enquiries**

Telephone: 0845 300 0627  
Textphone: 0845 302 1408  
Monday to Friday 8am to 8pm  
Saturday 8am to 4pm  

$C 

You can also write to HMRC.

$A
HM Revenue & Customs  
Pay As You Earn  
PO Box 1970  
Liverpool  
L75 1WX
$A

*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs
overview: How to tell HM Revenue & Customs that your tax code isn't right.
title: Reporting your tax code as wrong
